description.english: Earn a profit of more than $50,000 in a single level.
description.german: Erziele einen Gewinn von mehr als 50.000 $ in einem einzigen Level.
description.french: Réalisez un profit de plus de 50 000 $ sur un seul niveau.
description.italian: Guadagna profitti superiori a 50.000 $ in un solo livello.
description.spanish: Consigue un beneficio superior a 50 000 $ en un nivel individual.
description.schinese: 在单个级别中赚超过$50,000的利润。
description.russian: Получите прибыль более 50 000 $ на одном уровне.
description.polish: Zdobądź na jednym poziomie co najmniej 50 000 $ zysku.
description.dutch: Behaal een winst van meer dan $50.000 op één stuk land.
description.brazilian: Ganhe um lucro de mais de US$ 50.000 em um único nível.

description.english: Earn a profit of more than $100,000 in a single level.
description.german: Erziele einen Gewinn von mehr als 100.000 $ in einem einzigen Level.
description.french: Réalisez un profit de plus de 100 000 $ sur un seul niveau.
description.italian: Guadagna profitti superiori a 100.000 $ in un solo livello.
description.spanish: Consigue un beneficio superior a 100 000 $ en un nivel individual.
description.schinese: 在单个级别中赚超过$100,000的利润。
description.russian: Получите прибыль в размере более  100 000 $ на одном уровне.
description.polish: Zdobądź na jednym poziomie co najmniej 100 000 $ zysku.
description.dutch: Behaal een winst van meer dan $100.000 op één stuk land.
description.brazilian: Ganhe um lucro de mais de US$ 100.000 em um único nível.

description.english: Have more than one million in your bank account
description.german: Habe mehr als eine Million auf deinem Konto.
description.french: Accumulez plus d'un million sur votre compte bancaire.
description.italian: Hai più di un milione sul tuo conto in banca.
description.spanish: Consigue que tu cuenta bancaria supere el millón.
description.schinese: 您的银行帐户中有超过一百万。
description.russian: Положите более одного миллиона на свой банковский счет.
description.polish: Miej co najmniej jeden milion na swoim koncie bankowym.
description.dutch: Heb meer dan één  milljoen op de bank.
description.brazilian: Tenha mais de um milhão em sua conta bancária.

description.english: Beat the campaign.
description.german: Gewinne den Wahlkampf.
description.french: Battez la campagne.
description.italian: Batti la campagna.
description.spanish: Gana la campaña.
description.schinese: 在活动中取胜！
description.polish: Ukończ kampanię.
description.dutch: Win het spel.
description.brazilian: Supere a campanha.

description.english: Beat the campaign in expert mode.
description.german: Gewinne den Wahlkampf im Expertenmodus.
description.french: Battez la campagne en mode expert.
description.italian: Batti la campagna in modalità esperto.
description.spanish: Gana la campaña en la modalidad experta.
description.schinese: 在专家模式的活动中取胜。
description.polish: Ukończ kampanię na poziomie eksperckim.
description.dutch: Win het spel in expert modus.
description.brazilian: Supere a campanha no modo especialista.

description.english: Beat the campaign and have more than one million in your bank account.
description.german: Gewinne den Wahlkampf und habe mehr als eine Million auf deinem Konto.
description.french: Battez la campagne et accumulez plus d'un million sur votre compte bancaire.
description.italian: Batti la concorrenza e raggiungi oltre il milione sul tuo conto in banca.
description.spanish: Gana la campaña y  consigue que tu cuenta bancaria supere el millón.
description.schinese: 在活动中取胜，并且在银行帐户中有超过一百万。
description.russian: Пройдите кампанию и положите более миллиона на свой банковский счет.
description.polish: Ukończ kampanię i miej co najmniej jeden milion na swoim koncie bankowym.
description.dutch: Win het spel en heb meer dan één  miljoen op de bank.
description.brazilian: Supere a campanha e tenha mais de um milhão em sua conta bancária.

description.english: Own all the shares.
description.german: Besitze alle Aktien.
description.french: Détenez toutes les actions.
description.italian: Possiedi tutte le azioni.
description.spanish: Posee las acciones.
description.schinese: 拥有所有股份。
description.polish: Posiadaj wszystkie udziały.
description.dutch: Bezit alle aandelen.
description.brazilian: Possua todas as ações.

description.english: Own all the shares and have one million in your bank account.
description.german: Besitze alle Aktien und habe mehr als eine Million auf deinem Konto.
description.french: Détenez toutes les actions et accumulez un million sur votre compte bancaire.
description.italian: Possiedi tutte le azioni e hai oltre un milione sul tuo conto in banca.
description.spanish: Posee todas las acciones y consigue que tu cuenta supere el millón.
description.schinese: 拥有所有股份，并且在银行帐户中有超过一百万。
description.russian: Приобретите все акции и положите миллион на свой банковский счет.
description.polish: Posiadaj wszystkie udziały i miej co najmniej jeden milion na swoim koncie bankowym.
description.dutch: Bezit alle aandelen en heb meer dan één miljoen op de bank.
description.brazilian: Possua todas as ações e tenha um milhão em sua conta bancária.

description.english: Get all the oil in a level above ground.
description.german: Hole dir alles Öl oberhalb des Bodens.
description.french: Obtenez tout le pétrole dans un niveau au-dessus du sol.
description.italian: Prendi tutto il petrolio sopra il livello del suolo.
description.spanish: Consigue todo el petróleo por encima del nivel del suelo.
description.schinese: 获得地面上一层的所有石油。
description.russian: Извлеките всю нефть на уровне на поверхность.
description.polish: Zdobądź całą ropę na poziomie powyżej gruntu.
description.dutch: Haal alle olie uit de grond.
description.brazilian: Obtenha todo o petróleo em um nível acima da superfície.

description.english: Boost the oil price above $2.00.
description.german: Jage den Ölpreis auf über 2,00 $ hoch.
description.french: Augmentez le prix du pétrole au-dessus de 2,00 $.
description.italian: Gonfia il prezzo del petrolio oltre i 2,00 $.
description.spanish: Incrementa el precio del petróleo por encima de los 2 $.
description.schinese: 将油价提至高于$2.00。
description.polish: Zwiększ cenę ropy do poziomu powyżej 2,00 $
description.dutch: Verkoop olie tegen een prijs hoger dan $2,00.
description.brazilian: Aumente o preço do petróleo para mais de US$ 2,00.

description.english: Boost the oil price above $2.50.
description.german: Jage den Ölpreis auf über 2,50 $ hoch.
description.french: Augmentez le prix du pétrole au-dessus de 2,50 $.
description.italian: Gonfia il prezzo del petrolio oltre i 2,50 $.
description.spanish: Incrementa el precio del petróleo por encima de los 2,50 $.
description.schinese: 将油价提至高于$2.50。
description.polish: Zwiększ cenę ropy do poziomu powyżej 2,50 $
description.dutch: Verkoop olie tegen een prijs hoger dan $2,50.
description.brazilian: Aumente o preço do petróleo para mais de US$ 2,50.

description.english: Sell oil at a price below $0.25.
description.german: Setze den Ölpreis unterhalb von 0,25 $ an.
description.french: Vendez du pétrole à un prix inférieur à 0,25 $.
description.italian: Vendi petrolio al di sotto di 0,25 $.
description.spanish: Vende petróleo a un precio inferior a 0,25 $.
description.schinese: 以低于$0.25的价格出售石油。
description.polish: Sprzedaj ropę w cenie poniżej poziomu 0,25 $
description.dutch: Verkoop olie tegen een prijs lager dan $0,25.
description.brazilian: Venda petróleo a um preço inferior a US$ 0,25.

description.english: Buy all the factory upgrades.
description.german: Kaufe alle Fabrik-Upgrades.
description.french: Achetez toutes les améliorations d'usine.
description.italian: Compra tutti gli aggiornamenti della fabbrica.
description.spanish: Compra todas las mejoras de fábrica.
description.schinese: 购买所有工厂升级。
description.polish: Kup wszystkie ulepszenia fabryki.
description.dutch: Koop alle upgrades van de fabriek.
description.brazilian: Compre todas as melhorias para a fábrica.

description.english: Buy all the workshop upgrades.
description.german: Kaufe alle Werkstatt-Upgrades.
description.french: Achetez toutes les améliorations des ateliers.

description.spanish: Compra todas las mejoras del taller.
description.schinese: 购买所有车间升级。
description.polish: Kup wszystkie ulepszenia zakładu.
description.dutch: Koop alle upgrades van Edward.
description.brazilian: Compre todas as melhorias para a oficina.

description.english: Buy all the stable upgrades.
description.german: Kaufe alle Stabilität-Upgrades.

description.italian: Compra tutti gli aggiornamenti della stalla.
description.spanish: Compra todas las mejoras estables.

description.polish: Kup wszystkie ulepszenia stajni.
description.dutch: Koop alle upgrades van de stal.
description.brazilian: Compre todas as melhorias para o estábulo.

description.english: Get a diamond.
description.german: Hole dir einen Diamanten.
description.french: Obtenez un diamant.
description.italian: Ricevi un diamante.
description.spanish: Consigue un diamante.
description.schinese: 得到一颗钻石。
description.polish: Otrzymaj diament.
description.dutch: Vind een diamant.
description.brazilian: Consiga um diamante.

description.english: Read all the Mayor's Tips.
description.german: Kaufe die Tipps des Bürgermeisters.
description.french: Achetez tous les conseils du maire.
description.italian: Compra tutti i consigli del Sindaco.
description.spanish: Compra todos los Consejos Mayores.
description.schinese: 购买所有市场小贴士
description.polish: Kup wszystkie Wskazówki Burmistrza.
description.dutch: Koop alle tips van de burgemeester.
description.brazilian: Compre todos os conselhos do prefeito.

description.english: Get a spillage fine of over $10,000.
description.german: Erhalte eine Strafe wegen Ölverschüttung von mehr als 10.000 $.
description.french: Recevez une amende pour un déversement de pétrole de plus de 10 000 $.
description.italian: Ricevi una multa per spillaggio di oltre 10.000 $.
description.spanish: Recibe una multa superior a 10 000 $ por derramar.
description.schinese: 受到超过$10,000的泄漏处罚。
description.russian: Получите штраф за розлив в размере более 10 000 $.
description.polish: Otrzymaj karę za wyciek w wysokości co najmniej 10 000 $.
description.dutch: Krijg een boete voor het verspillen van olie van $10.000 of hoger.
description.brazilian: Receba uma multa de derramamento superior a US$ 10.000.

description.english: Overbid someone at the land auction.
description.german: Überbiete jemanden bei der Landauktion.
description.french: Surenchérissez sur quelqu'un à la vente aux enchères du terrain.
description.italian: Fai un'offerta più alta di quella degli altri all'asta dei terreni.
description.spanish: Sobrepuja a alguien en la subasta de tierras.
description.schinese: 在土地拍卖上的出价高过某人。
description.russian: Предложите более высокую цену на земельном аукционе, чем чья-то цена.
description.polish: Przelicytuj kogoś w aukcji o grunt.
description.dutch: Overbied een ander op de landveiling.
description.brazilian: Vença alguém no leilão de terras.

description.dutch: Betaal meer dan $10.000 voor een stuk land.

description.english: Practice shooting on the dove. (The Heat Is On)
description.german: Übe das Schießen auf die Taube.
description.french: Entraînez-vous à tirer sur le pigeon. (The Heat Is On)

description.schinese: 练习向鸽子射击。（“热力来袭”）
description.russian: Потренируйтесь в стрельбе по голубям. («Стало жарко»)

description.dutch: Gebruik de duif om je schuttersvaardigheden te oefenen. (The Heat Is On)
description.brazilian: Prática de tiro na pomba. (The Heat Is On)

description.english: Acquaint yourself with the village cat. (The Heat Is On)
description.german: Mache dich mit der Dorfkatze bekannt.

description.schinese: 和村里的猫熟悉起来。（“热力来袭”）
description.polish: Zapoznaj się z wiejskim kotem. (Robi się gorąco)
description.dutch: Stel jezelf voor aan de dorpskat. (The Heat Is On)
description.brazilian: Conheça o gato da aldeia. (The Heat Is On)

displayName.italian: Il massimo a cui si può aspirare

description.english: Sell a treasure for $2,000 or more (The Heat Is On)
description.german: Verkaufe einen Schatz für $ 2.000 oder mehr
description.french: Vendez un trésor pour 2 000 $ ou plus. (The Heat Is On)

description.spanish: Vende un tesoro por 2000 $ o más. (The Heat Is On)
description.schinese: 以$2,000以上的价格出售宝藏（“热力来袭”）
description.russian: Продайте сокровище за 2000 $ или больше («Стало жарко»)

description.dutch: Verkoop een schat voor $2.000 of meer. (The Heat Is On)
description.brazilian: Venda um tesouro por $2.000 ou mais (The Heat Is On)

description.english: Complete Anthony’s treasure collection. (The Heat Is On)
description.german: Mache Anthonys Schatzsammlung komplett.
description.french: Complétez la collection de trésors d'Anthony. (The Heat Is On)

description.spanish: Completa la colección de tesoros de Anthony. (The Heat Is On)
description.schinese: 完成安东尼的宝藏系列。（“热力来袭”）

description.dutch: Maak de verzameling van Anthony compleet (The Heat Is On)
description.brazilian: Complete a coleção de tesouros de Anthony. (The Heat Is On)

description.english: Convert an oil well to gas and triple its size. (The Heat Is On)
description.german: Wandle eine Ölquelle in Gas um und verdreifache ihre Größe.
description.french: Convertissez un puits de pétrole en gaz et triplez sa taille. (The Heat Is On)
description.italian: Converti un pozzo di petrolio in un giacimento di gas e triplicane le dimensioni. (The Heat Is On)
description.spanish: Convierte un pozo de petróleo en gas y triplica su tamaño. (The Heat Is On)
description.schinese: 把油井变成气的，并扩大三倍大小。（“热力来袭”）
description.russian: Преобразуйте нефтяные месторождения в газовые и утройте их размер. («Стало жарко»)
description.polish: Przekształć szyb naftowy na gaz i powiększ go trzykrotnie. (Robi się gorąco)
description.dutch: Zet alle olie in een olieveld om naar gas en verdriedubbel het formaat van het verkregen gasveld. (The Heat Is On)
description.brazilian: Converta um poço de petróleo em gás e triplique o seu tamanho. (The Heat Is On)

description.english: Buy all the shed upgrades. (The Heat Is On)

description.polish: Kup wszystkie rozszerzenia szopy. (Robi się gorąco)
description.dutch: Koop alle upgrades van de schuur. (The Heat Is On)
description.brazilian: Compre todas as atualizações do galpão. (The Heat Is On)
